name: NSAccessibility
desc: A namespace for accessibility symbols for AppKit apps.

items.name: static func post(element: Any, notification: NSAccessibility.Notification)
items.desc: Sends a notification to any observing assistive apps.

items.name: static func post(element: Any, notification: NSAccessibility.Notification, userInfo: [NSAccessibility.NotificationUserInfoKey : Any]?)
items.desc: Sends a notification and an optional user info dictionary to any observing assistive apps.

items.name: static func unignoredAncestor(of: Any) -> Any?
items.desc: Returns an unignored accessibility object, ascending the hierarchy, if necessary.

items.name: static func unignoredChildren(from: [Any]) -> [Any]
items.desc: Returns a list of unignored accessibility objects, descending the hierarchy, if necessary.

items.name: static func unignoredChildrenForOnlyChild(from: Any) -> [Any]
items.desc: Returns a list of unignored accessibility objects, descending the hierarchy, if necessary.

items.name: static func unignoredDescendant(of: Any) -> Any?
items.desc: Returns an unignored accessibility object, descending the hierarchy, if necessary.

items.name: static func screenPoint(fromView: NSView, point: NSPoint) -> NSPoint
items.desc: Returns the point in screen coordinates.

items.name: static func screenRect(fromView: NSView, rect: NSRect) -> NSRect
items.desc: Returns the frame in screen coordinates.

items.name: static func setMayContainProtectedContent(Bool) -> Bool
items.desc: Sets whether the app may have protected content.

items.name: static let ErrorCodeExceptionInfo: String
items.desc: An integer error code for debugging.

items.name: init(_reserved: UnsafeMutableRawPointer)
items.desc: Creates an accessibility structure.

items.name: struct NSAccessibility.Action
items.desc: Constants that describe types of actions.

items.name: struct NSAccessibility.AnnotationAttributeKey
items.desc: Keys for annotation attributes.

items.name: struct NSAccessibility.Attribute
items.desc: Constants that describe attributes.

items.name: struct NSAccessibility.FontAttributeKey
items.desc: Keys for font attributes.

items.name: struct NSAccessibility.Notification
items.desc: The name of the notification.

items.name: struct NSAccessibility.NotificationUserInfoKey
items.desc: The key in the user info dictionary for a notification.

items.name: struct NSAccessibility.OrientationValue
items.desc: Values that indicate the orientation of user interface elements, such as scroll bars and split views.

items.name: struct NSAccessibility.ParameterizedAttribute
items.desc: Values that describe parameterized attributes.

items.name: struct NSAccessibility.Role
items.desc: Values that describe types of objects that accessibility elements represent.

items.name: struct NSAccessibility.RulerMarkerTypeValue
items.desc: Values that describe ruler marker types.

items.name: struct NSAccessibility.RulerUnitValue
items.desc: Values that indicate the unit values of a ruler or layout area.

items.name: struct NSAccessibility.SortDirectionValue
items.desc: Values that indicate the sort direction of a column.

items.name: struct NSAccessibility.Subrole
items.desc: Values that describe specialized object subtypes that accessibility elements represent.
